thread.title: Montel Williams to back effort to legalize pot in Ohio
thread.title_full: Montel Williams to back effort to legalize pot in Ohio

title: Montel Williams to back effort to legalize pot in Ohio
text: > Entertainment Montel Williams to back effort to legalize pot in Ohio FILE - In this Oct. 18, 2012 file photo, Montel Williams is interviewed at the Arkansas state Capitol in Little Rock. An effort to legalize medical and recreational marijuana in Ohio is getting the backing of Williams. The celebrity who hosted "The Montel Williams Show" for a decade is scheduled to endorse Issue 3 during a Columbus appearance Wednesday, Oct. 21, 2015. (AP Photo/Danny Johnston)
